Almanac

The game is an easter egg hunt game based on the book Ready Player One. The game starts from the almanac, an important and inevitable piece of the game. A couple of levels cannot be played from mobile phones, so a laptop is advisable for playing.


It starts with level 0, for thinning the herd.


Rest of the game is divided into three parts. Three keys and three gates, each key followed by a gate. The keys are important in solving the gate. whoever passes the third gate first is the winner.


Good Luck
